summary: Use this API to deactivate Product or SKUs corresponding to the product
description: Use this API to deactivate Product or SKUs corresponding to the product

query.name: apiRequestBody
query.description: Parameter ItemId is mandatory, Skus is optional

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/deactivate')
request.add_api_parameter("apiRequestBody", "<Request><Product><ItemId>234234234</ItemId><Skus><SkuId>20690462002</SkuId><SellerSku>5000</SellerSku></Skus></Product></Request>")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/deactivate')
request.add_api_param('apiRequestBody', '<Request><Product><ItemId>234234234</ItemId><Skus><SkuId>20690462002</SkuId><SellerSku>5000</SellerSku></Skus></Product></Request>')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: Seller sku field does not have uniqueness, so it cannot be used as a key field for editing products, please add SkuId field as product editing Key.
